data.message:
Lindner Student Action Team presents CEO of Uptown
Monday, January 27th | 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM | Lindner Room 608
The 20/20 Speaker Series presents: Beth A. Robinson, President and CEO of the Uptown Consortium, Inc.  She leads the Consortium’s efforts to revitalize Uptown Cincinnati including financing, real estate development, and advocacy. If you are interested in learning more about her career and the recent developments in Clifton, join us for this awesome event! All students, faculty, and Bearcats are encouraged to attend. Pizza will be provided. 

Learn more at www.lindnerstudent.com!

data.message:
On Thursday Janurary 16th from 11am-1pm, Skyline Chili has donated 250 3-Ways and will be serving them to LCB students FOR FREE!!!! Yes, we said for free!!! 
 
All students need to do before getting their FREE 3-Way, is have access to their electronic resume AND upload it in Recruit A Cat (everyone has done this!) then complete a 2min survey... And there you go, free lunch from the best chili spot in town!
